faculties_accepted: Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences (FASS)
College of Design and Engineering (CDE or FoE)
Yong Loo Lin School of Medicine (YLLSOM)
module_restrictions: It is important that you have the relevant academic background for the courses that you apply for. You must have taken modules at NUS within the specific subject field to be accepted to any of the faculties / departments at UvA.
visa_info: Information about immigration-related issues is available at: https://www.uva.nl/en/education/other-programmes/exchange/practical-matters/visas-and-permits/visas-and-permits.html
accommodations_info:
Information about student housing is available at: 
https://www.uva.nl/en/education/other-programmes/exchange/practical-matters/housing/housing.html 
For students going to AUC: 
https://www.auc.nl/life-at-auc-students/campus/student-residences/student-residences.html
cost_of_living:
The cost of living and estimated expenses in Amsterdam can be found at: 
https://www.uva.nl/en/education/other-programmes/exchange/practical-matters/living-in-amsterdam/living-expenses/living-expenses.html
